com.ibm.portal.cp
Enum Scope

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Scope>
      com.ibm.portal.cp.Scope
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scope>
public enum Scope
extends java.lang.Enum<Scope>

The Scope enumeration describes the visibility and type of collaboration of tag spaces or rating spaces. Examples:

  • The personal private scope of a tag space addresses only tags that the current user has assigned privately.
  • The personal public scope of a tag space addresses only tags that the current user has assigned publicly.
  • The community scope of a tag space addresses all publicly assigned tags of all users except the current user. This means that the current user never is part of the community in this point of view.

Since:
7.0.0
See Also:
for constants of query parameter keys and values of the scope enumeration.
